price: 56. Мре nakelaki bilima na bato te sé тропа kobondela ngai.
arabic: وَمَا خَلَقۡتُ ٱلۡجِنَّ وَٱلۡإِنسَ إِلَّا لِيَعۡبُدُونِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā khalaqtu al-jina wal-insa illā liyaʿbudūni
